医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究发现，通过直邮方式进行 HPV 自采样试剂盒可提高宫颈癌筛查率研究人员检查了选择加入和直邮策略的有效性，以根据宫颈癌筛查历史向人群提供人乳头瘤病毒（HPV）自我采样套件。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231128/HPV-self-sampling-kits-via-direct-mail-boost-cervical-cancer-screening-rates-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231128/HPV-self-sampling-kits-via-direct-mail-boost-cervical-cancer-screening-rates-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0f774361-ad5f-458b-9ea5-2bfa2a0fb911 Tue, 28 Nov 2023 11:04:00 -0500 HPV self-sampling kits via direct mail boost cervical cancer screening rates, study finds
通过人工智能驱动的虚拟筛选推出新型心肌肌球蛋白抑制剂发现一种新型心脏特异性肌球蛋白调节剂。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231128/Unveiling-a-new-cardiac-myosin-inhibitor-through-AI-driven-virtual-screening.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231128/Unveiling-a-new-cardiac-myosin-inhibitor-through-AI-driven-virtual-screening.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b860c6d8-9709-4caa-ae20-599953dea1b3 Tue, 28 Nov 2023 08:27:00 -0500 Unveiling a new cardiac myosin inhibitor through AI-driven virtual screening
Exonate 宣布成功完成糖尿病黄斑水肿 Ib/IIa 期试验主要眼科候选药物 EXN407 有潜力成为第一个治疗糖尿病视网膜病变/糖尿病黄斑水肿的局部治疗药物。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231128/Exonate-announces-successful-completion-of-Phase-IbIIa-trial-in-diabetic-maulous-oedema.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231128/Exonate-announces-successful-completion-of-Phase-IbIIa-trial-in-diabetic-maulous-oedema.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=63483e6d-e428-4ece-8669-b694cb16fd7c Tue, 28 Nov 2023 08:02:00 -0500 Exonate announces successful completion of Phase Ib/IIa trial in diabetic macular oedema
PharmaKure 首席执行官 Farid Khan 博士将在 2023 年曼彻斯特生物技术外包策略会议上就阿尔茨海默病的诊断和治疗发表演讲重点讨论从药物再利用到诊断和治疗阿尔茨海默病的临床试验的衍生历程。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231128/Dr-Farid-Khan-PharmaKure-CEO-to-speak-on-Alzheimers-diagnosis-and-treatment-at-Biotech-Outsource-Strategies-Manchester- 2023.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231128/Dr-Farid-Khan-PharmaKure-CEO-to-speak-on-Alzheimers-diagnosis-and-treatment-at-Biotech-Outsource-Strategies-Manchester- 2023.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2d8a051f-ecc3-4e88-84a6-1d25bbc1aafb Tue, 28 Nov 2023 07:57:00 -0500 Dr Farid Khan, PharmaKure CEO, to speak on Alzheimer's diagnosis and treatment at Biotech Outsourcing Strategies Manchester 2023
BioEcho Life Sciences 凭借 FDA 列出的产品进入美国诊断市场EchoLUTION 病毒 RNA/DNA 试剂盒现已在美国诊断市场上市，可通过单步离心技术从病毒颗粒中提取核酸，从而缩短体外诊断分析的处理时间。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231128/BioEcho-Life-Sciences-enters-the-US-diagnostic-market-with-an-FDA-listed-product.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231128/BioEcho-Life-Sciences-enters-the-US-diagnostic-market-with-an-FDA-listed-product.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f48f5dc2-9846-4827-8270-bf98084aa7c1 Tue, 28 Nov 2023 07:50:00 -0500 BioEcho Life Sciences enters the US diagnostic market with an FDA-listed product
基于应用程序的创新游戏可提高前庭功能障碍患者的运动表现游戏应用程序对锻炼表现的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231128/Innovative-app-based-games-boost-exercise-performance-for-vestibular-hypofunction-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231128/Innovative-app-based-games-boost-exercise-performance-for-vestibular-hypofunction-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=eb74b9f6-8d12-43be-9225-75175d95e686 Tue, 28 Nov 2023 07:12:00 -0500 Innovative app-based games boost exercise performance for vestibular hypofunction patients

她曾就老龄问题向总统提供建议。现在，她正在与严重的残疾和抑郁症作斗争。当我滚动浏览 LinkedIn 上的帖子时，GoFundMe 请求突然出现在我面前。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231128/She-once-advised-the-president-on-aging-issues-Now-shee28099s-battle-serious-disability-and-depression.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231128/She-once-advised-the-president-on-aging-issues-Now-shee28099s-battle-serious-disability-and-depression.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a950a69c-1ebd-4a44-91c8-3616ca0656df Tue, 28 Nov 2023 06:14:28 -0500 She once advised the president on aging issues. Now, she’s battling serious disability and depression.
